summary:
A save game based on my LUNARI RACE follower CELES.
Made by request.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=8][color=orange][u][i]Celes
Lunari Race Savegame[/center][/size][/color][/u][/i]
[center][size=4](made by request)[/size][/center]


[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Features:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
A savegame of the Lunari Celes right after creation.

[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Required Mods:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22598]Oblivion Hair Pack AIO[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602]Lunari Race[/url]

[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Recommended Mods:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP Body[/url]

[b][color=yellow] [u] INSTALLATION: [/color][/u] [/b] 
Download the file and extract it with any tool you want.
Put it in your Save game folder
C:\\Users\\YOURUSERNAME\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves

If you have any requests or suggestions, they are welcome :)

[b] Please [color=red] COMMENT [/color] and [color=red] ENDORSE! [/color][/b]

[color=yellow][b][u]My other mods:[/color][/b][/u][size=0.5](Click the images)[/size]

Check out my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2274584]profile[/url] if you want more of my mods. Some of my mods are following:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23639]Jasmin Lunari Race 1H Trainer Follower[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22598] [img]http://images.all-free-download.com/images/graphiclarge/the_elder_scrolls_iv_oblivion_2_94817.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22816] [img] http://vagrantbard.files.wordpress.com/2011/05/fallout_3_icon.png[/img][/url]
